data.text:
Fabulous hotel. The staff was all exemplary - helpful, friendly and unfailingly pleasant and courteous. Very considerate of every need. Katherine and all the other wait staff  at the breakfast were so lovely - cheerfully taking care of very need.
Wonderful location - walkable to many areas and easy access to metro, Aerobus and taxis all over the city and region. Can’t wait to come back.
data.title: Fabulous hotel

data.text: Great stay in Barcelona! One of the nicest trips I have ever had, good location, the room amazing, and the staff was wonderfull, always super friendly  and with great suggestions of where to go! I come back to Barcelona, I will stay in this Hotel once again.
data.title: Great experience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear H3058YMjohnd,

Thank you so much for your fantastic review! We're thrilled to hear that you had a great stay in Barcelona and that our hotel contributed to one of your nicest trips ever. We're delighted that you found our location convenient, the room amazing, and our staff wonderful. Your kind words mean a lot to us, and we can't wait to welcome you back on your next visit to Barcelona!

Best regards,
owner_response.author: Javier  Garcia

data.text:
From the moment we arrived until the moment we left the whole stay was wonderful, Silva, Mark and the two other ladies on reception (sorry I can’t remember their names) were excellent. Nothing was too much trouble. They gave us so much help, Mark with our trip to Montserrat and the other lady with information about the final stage of the Volta tour of Spain. 
They are such a joyful enthusiastic  team. A credit to themselves and the hotel.

The breakfast is a real treat, incredible choice, well presented and cooked.

We also can’t finish without thanking Ekat Lay, Lory and Corrine who served us our amazing breakfast, Great fun and again ready to organise whatever combination of food my “difficult” husband decided he wanted to try.

We had never been to Barcelona before, but will go back and absolutely recommend the hotel.
Room was really comfortable, we slept well, it was quiet, would recommend a room with a terrace over looking the garden.
Its position is perfect for La Rambles, Catalonia Square and the Gaudi sites. 
H10 have several hotels in Barcelona, we picked this one for the area it was in and we were really pleased we did.
data.title: Hotel helped make the trip perfect.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear jeannefS5749XC,

Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We're thrilled to hear that your stay with us helped make your trip perfect. We're delighted that Silvia, Mark, and the rest of our reception team provided excellent service and assistance throughout your stay. It's fantastic to know that you enjoyed the breakfast and that Ekat Lay, Lory, and Corrine made your dining experience memorable. We're glad you found your room comfortable and enjoyed the quietness, and we appreciate your recommendation of a room with a terrace overlooking the garden. Thank you for choosing our hotel, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Barcelona.

Best regards,
owner_response.author: Javier  Garcia

data.text:
I visited the hotel with my daughter for 3 days. The experience was just amazing! The welcome of Marc Lee, always here to help and very discreet at the same time! 
Also loved the breakfast experience with Ekaterine and delicious varied à la carte crêpes, wafers, chorisos, eggs perfectly cooked, fruits, yogourts and amazing muffins!!! Also, we enjoyed one night in a room with private jakouzi on our terasse, very special when all hotel swimming pools in Barcelona are too cold! 
Thank you so much for this precious time with my daughter
data.title: Wry special precious time with daughter. Great tuff!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear vanessakC6820JQ,

Thank you for choosing our hotel for your visit with your daughter, and we're thrilled to hear about your amazing experience! We're delighted that Marc Lee's welcome made your stay memorable and that you enjoyed the delicious and varied breakfast experience with Ekaterine.

It's wonderful to know that the private jacuzzi on your terrace added a special touch to your stay. We appreciate your kind words and are grateful to have been a part of creating precious moments with you and your daughter. We hope to welcome you back for another memorable stay.

Best Regards,
owner_response.author: Javier  Garcia

data.text:
Convenient location, friendly staff, and beautiful interior.

The pros:
1/ they have connecting rooms available 
2/ the common area is tastefully and thematically decorated
3/ staff is generally friendly and helpful, although a few misses but mainly good
4/ the rooms are kept clean and also nicely decorated
5/ cleaning staff is wonderful
6/ location is amazing, 5 to 20 min walks to so many sites, quality restaurants, and shopping; you felt the energy in the area yet not too loud
7/ the balcony (our rooms had it) was serene 
8/ nice bar on site
9/ tons of restaurant literally downstairs, although we didnt go to any of them

Cons:
1/ no usb outlets or plugs with it, also power issues when charging my iPhone depending on the plug within the room
2/ 1 or 2 staff members were quite cold and indifferent 
3/ they do not exchange money or can offer change
4/ tv was on the smaller side
data.title: You wont regret the stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear manageout1,

Thank you for choosing our hotel, and we appreciate your detailed feedback!

We're delighted you enjoyed the connecting rooms, tasteful decor, friendly staff, and the cleanliness of our rooms. It's fantastic to hear that you appreciated the wonderful cleaning staff and the amazing location with a serene balcony.

We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced, and we'll address the issues with the power outlets, staff demeanor, currency exchange, and TV size to improve future stays. Your insights are valuable, and we hope to welcome you back for an even better experience.

Best Regards,
owner_response.author: Javier  Garcia
